content: He destroyed free speech with twitter, will he destroy cryptos too? Their digital censorship champion has arrived... the jack.fyi for preview you can check on how nostr protocol censors, by "partitioning". It's quite smooth, say something "unapproved by the Authorities" and all the nodes jack and his followers control start to drop your "txs", but you ain't "censored", just partitioned away .
